about_the_game:
Bun-Bun Poggers is back and this time must face the dangers of hungry wolves without the luxury of open fields to move and dodge as freely as before!

In Poggers 2: A-Maze-Thing, you must help the absolutely adorable Bun-Bun navigate many different hedge mazes where death could be around every corner! You won't be without your Super Bunny magical carrots as they will be available to you in every corner of every new labyrinth you'll progress through. Power-ups can also provide you with speed, bonus point multipliers, and even extra lives!

Once again, randomly placed rocks will thwart your movement but even more this time around because of the already narrow paths of the mazes. Eating your magical carrots will give you the power to get revenge on that hungry wolf that took your last life in your previous game, but it could also help you destroy a rock or two instead! Whatever path you take is yours to make, and let's just hope it doesn't lead to Bun-Buns fate!

Get ready for the most adrenaline inducing moments Mr Bun-Bun Poggers has ever seen with Poggers 2: A-Maze-Thing! Can you prove yourself worthy on Steam and show the world that you are the "Pog Champ" once again?

name: Poggers 2 - A-Maze-Thing

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 2 Ghz CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB graphics card minimum
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT 650 or AMD HD 6870 or above
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
